typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	LoadDate as timestamp (currentUTC("Berlin")),
	RecordSource as string ('Northwind')
}
source(output(
		Product_SID as integer,
		Product_ID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DVHubProducts
source(output(
		Order_SID as integer,
		Order_ID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DVHubOrders
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Quantity as integer,
		Discount as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> NorthwindOrderDetails
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		SupplierID as integer,
		CategoryID as integer,
		QuantityPerUnit as string,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitsInStock as integer,
		UnitsOnOrder as integer,
		ReorderLevel as integer,
		Discontinued as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> NorthwindProducts
source(output(
		Link_Order_Details_SID as integer,
		Product_SID as integer,
		Order_SID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DVLinkOrderDetails
AuswaehlenProducts derive(LoadDate = $LoadDate,
		RecordSource = 'Northwind') ~> AbgeleiteteSpalteProducts
JoinProducts select(mapColumn(
		ProductName,
		Product_SID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AuswaehlenProducts
JoinLinkOrderDetails select(mapColumn(
		Quantity,
		UnitPrice,
		Link_Order_Details_SID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AuswahlenOrderDetails
AuswahlenOrderDetails derive(LoadDate = $LoadDate,
		RecordSource = 'Northwind') ~> AbgeleiteteSpalte1
DVHubProducts, NorthwindProducts join(Product_SID == ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProducts
DVHubOrders, NorthwindOrderDetails join(Order_ID == OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOrders
JoinOrders, DVHubProducts join(Order_SID == Product_SID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProducts2
JoinProducts2, DVLinkOrderDetails join(DVHubOrders@Order_SID == DVLinkOrderDetails@Order_SID
	&& DVHubProducts@Product_SID == DVLinkOrderDetails@Product_SID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLinkOrderDetails
AbgeleiteteSpalteProducts sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Product_SID as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ProductName,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource,
		Product_SID
	)) ~> DVSatProducts
AbgeleiteteSpalte1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Link_Order_Details_SID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as double,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Link_Order_Details_SID,
		Quantity,
		UnitPrice,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource
	)) ~> DVSatOrderDetails
